issue.title: [CF 774] Add a setting to Runes condition to force top-row runes to match non-death runes only.
issue.body:
Quote from WowInterface PM:

I think I found the reason why. When Blood Tap activates a fully-depleted Blood Rune slot as a Death Rune, the TMW filters see it as a Blood Rune.

Currently, runes on the top row can match either a normal rune or a death rune.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #774 | Raw

comments.body:
Done in r782


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
